sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; const DisplayPosts = ({id,test,data,del}) => { console.log(data) const filteredPosts=data.filter((post)=>post.id===id) const {title,category,text}=filteredPosts return(

ID: {id}

Title: {filteredPosts.title}

Category: {filteredPosts.category}

Text:{text}

) }; export default DisplayPosts;
